welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Isidro, Argentina! Prepare to be enchanted by our charming city known for its historic buildings, vibrant culture, and scenic views. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that San Isidro has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.
